Harvester.name: BMS - Scrap Hauler
Harvester.description: The Scrap Hauler, designed by the Bassett Motor Society is a heavy-duty piece of machinery designed to reduce scrap metal and other materials into usable, raw resources. Scrap Haulers are often used to extract battlefield resources following skirmishes.

ConstructionVehicleAdvanced.name: BMS - Fabricator
ConstructionVehicleAdvanced.description: An advanced variant of the Universal Assembly Rig, the BMS - Fabricator is fitted with a unique kit designed to handle advanced or specialized construction and excavation jobs.

ScoutTankGallant.name: King Gallant Mk. II
ScoutTankGallant.description: A heavily armoured variant of the King Spire, the Gallant Mk. II boasts a weighty 30mm cannon at the cost of top speed.

FieldAntiTankHeavy.name: Balfour Rampart 68mm
FieldAntiTankHeavy.description: The Rampart is a powerful field cannon capable of dealing devastating damage to all but the heaviest of armoured vehicles while providing its crew with comprehensive ballistic shielding.

Cannoneer (Right): Equipped with a high velocity barrel that deals 25% extra damage per shot
High chance to penetrate armoured vehicles

TrailerLargeItem.name: Rooster - Tumblebox
TrailerLargeItem.description: A simple towable trailer that holds heavier building materials.

TrailerFuel.name: Rooster - Lamploader
TrailerFuel.description: A simple towable trailer that holds various fuel sources and can be used to refuel vehicles.

TruckHeavy.name: Cnute Cliffwrest
TruckHeavy.description: This heavy-duty service vehicle has reinforced tires orignally designed to haul large resource caches and heavy weapons along the craggy cliffs of Sorovia.
